metadata.title: CVE-2019-11187 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Incorrect Access Control in the LDAP class of GONICUS GOsa through2019-04-11 allows an attacker to log into any account with a usernamecontaining the case-insensitive substring "success" when an arbitrarypassword is provided.

criterions.comment: gosa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
